permissions: Anyone can list press releases, but anonymous and non-admin users only see press releases that are published and have released_at on or before the current time; admins can see all.
validation_notes: Filters use AND logic. published expects true/false. released-at-min and released-at-max use YYYY-MM-DD.

flags.name: published
flags.validation: Expected values: true or false. Example: true.

flags.name: released-at-max
flags.description: Filter to press releases released on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: released-at-min
flags.description: Filter to press releases released on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
